title: Kona Grill serves Catch Me If You Can cocktail with specific ingredients
statement: Kona Grill serves a cocktail called 'Catch Me If You Can' made with Maker's Mark whisky, Grand Marnier, and Monin gingerbread.

citations.quote: Keep the spirit alive with our featured cocktail, Catch Me If You Can, a warming blend of Maker's Mark whisky, Grand Marnier, and Monin gingerbread.
